Maya Ali Family | Age | Height | Wiki | Biography | Salary | Affairs | Photo

Bolly Reporter
4 months ago

Maya Ali is a Pakistani Actress, Model and Video Jockey (VJ). Furthermore, She is a Very Talented and Beautiful Pakistani Actress & Model. Also, She appeared in the Pakistani Television Industry. Maya began her Acting career with TV Serial Durr-e-Shehwar as Mahnoor Sami.

Biography & Wiki

Maya Ali’s full name is Maryam Tanveer Ali and Nickname is Maya. She was born on 27 July 1989 in Lahore, Pakistan. Therefore, her current age is 30 years. Maya’s Zodiac is Leo. Her hometown is Karachi, Pakistan.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Family Members

Her brother’s name is Afnan Qureshi. And her Sister’s name is Sajal Ali.

Education and School, College

Maya Ali completed her Masters in Mass Communication from Queen Mary College, Lahore.

Boys, affairs, spouse name

As per media, Maya had a relationship with Usman Khalid Butt.

Favorites Things and Like & Dislike

Maya Ali filmography

Maya started her career as a video jockey at Samaa TV, Waqt News, and Dunya News. Furthermore, Maya became popular for the Serials Diyar-e-Dil (as Faara Khan) and Mann Mayal (Manahil). She has received Best On-screen Couple Award and Best TV Actress Award for her acting performance. Maya Ali made her movie debut with Teefa In Trouble, where she playing a role as Anya.

She played the lead role in many dramas including Durr-e- Shehwar, Aik Nayee Cindrella, Aunn Zara, Meri Zindgi Hai Tu, Ladoon Mein Pali, Shanakht, Zid, Mera Naam Yousaf Hai, Diyar-e-Dil, Mann Mayal, and Sanam.

Maya Ali was shined with her acting qualities in Shanakht, in which she assumed the part of Qurat-ul- Ain, and this play yet is censured by her family and society in 2014.

Salary and Net Worth

The Net worth of Maya is approximately Rs. 12 crores. She took 1.5 to 2 lac per episode for her astounding appearance as salary.
